<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 4](/Rules.aspx?ID=109)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 30 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Looking through the backgrounds, Adam likes the idea of a solitary dwarven druid, and the [nomad](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=28) background makes for a good choice. For the first ability boost granted by the background, Adam chooses Wisdom, and for the free ability boost, he choses Constitution, taking both up to 14. On the second page, he writes “[Assurance (Survival)](/Feats.aspx?ID=756)” in the Skill Feats area, on the Background line. Finally, returning to the first page, he writes “cave” next to the first Lore skill entry and checks the box under the “T” for that skill and Survival.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
